items.content_html: Captcha Validator is a lightweight and versatile JavaScript library for implementing and validating CAPTCHA challenges on web applications. This project aims to provide an easy-to-use and customizable solution to enhance the security of your online forms and protect against automated bots.

items.content_html: AuthHub is a lightweight and robust open-source authorization system designed for simplicity and security. Built on the power of MySQL for data storage and ExpressJS for seamless web application integration, it provides a straightforward solution for managing user access within your projects.
items.title: Owl1029/authhub: AuthHub is a lightweight and robust open-source authorization system designed for simplicity and security. Built on the power of MySQL for data storage and ExpressJS for seamless web application integration, it provides a straightforward solution for managing user access within your projects.
